name: aXnorg.projects.cel.cellular
short_description:
aXnorg.projects.cel.cellular is an application framework for the Crystal Entity Layer based on both the aXnorg.projects.cel.molecular and aXnorg.projects.cel.atomar frameworks.

The controlling project for this project is aXnorg.projects.cel.frames.form.
